# subscript(dynamicMember:)

**Instance Subscript**

Facilitates accessing product properties on a picker option value.

## Declaration

```swift
subscript<T>(dynamicMember keyPath: KeyPath<Product, T>) -> T { get }
```

## Discussion

You don’t use this subscript directly. Instead, access the properties of a [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/Product] instance directly on a [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/SubscriptionStoreControlStyleConfiguration/PickerOption] value.

## Dynamic member lookup support

- **subscript(dynamicMember:)**: Facilitates accessing optional subscription properties on a picker option value.
- **subscript(dynamicMember:)**: Facilitates accessing subscription properties on a picker option value.
